Technical specifications Product number: CHPW07 Display: Analogue Movement: Mechanical Hand-wind Case material: Metal Case (Length/Width/Height): 47 / 47 / 15 mm Band Material：Metal Chain Band width：5 millimeters Band (Length/Width): 370 / 5 mm Calendar function: no Water-Resistance (bar/ATM): no Package included: Pocket watch with Chain * 1 - Carrie Hughes Gift box * 1 How use mechanical watch? -1. When you first wear, turn the pocket watch button (clockwise) until it is full (15-20 hands). -2. Gently pull up the button, turn the adjustment time, and then press the button. -3. If you are still standing for a long time, please gently swing several times, winding a few laps. At this point it will work properly. -4. If you feel the winding is tight, please immediately stop spinning, so as not to damage the movement.
